about_the_game:
Gang up with the Van Saar in Necromunda: Underhive Wars!

This pack gives access to:
• The Van Saar gang in “Operations” and “Skirmish” modes, both player- and AI-controlled.
• New skills and a new perk for use by the Van Saar gang
• New cosmetic options for the Van Saar gang, including new weapon skins

Bring order to the Underhive with Necromunda's technological powerhouse - the Van Saar's high-tech suits preserving their life and, along with their extreme discipline, deployable turrets and spitting firepower, making them a true force to contend with.
detailed_description:
Gang up with the Van Saar in Necromunda: Underhive Wars!

This pack gives access to:
• The Van Saar gang in “Operations” and “Skirmish” modes, both player- and AI-controlled.
• New skills and a new perk for use by the Van Saar gang
• New cosmetic options for the Van Saar gang, including new weapon skins

Bring order to the Underhive with Necromunda's technological powerhouse - the Van Saar's high-tech suits preserving their life and, along with their extreme discipline, deployable turrets and spitting firepower, making them a true force to contend with.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS in 1920x1080 Low preset.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS in 1920x1080 High preset.

short_description: Gang up with the Van Saar in Necromunda: Underhive Wars! This DLC gives access to the Van Saar, their unique look and skills, for solo and multiplayer fights. Control the Underhive with advanced tech!

English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
